name: xmtpv3_wasm
author: jazzz <jazz@xmtp.com
description: Node.js package for the core XMTP utilities library

scripts.prepare: cd bindings/wasm && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: wasm-pack build -t web --out-dir src/pkg bindings/wasm/crate && rm -rf bindings/wasm/dist/ && rollup -c && cp -r bindings/wasm/dist dist
scripts.build:minify: npm run build && npx terser@latest --compress --mangle --output bindings/wasm/dist/cjs/index.cjs -- bindings/wasm/dist/cjs/index.cjs
scripts.format: npx prettier@latest --write bindings/wasm/src/src/ bindings/wasm/tests/ bindings/wasm/package.json bindings/wasm/rollup.config.js bindings/wasm/tsconfig.json bindings/wasm/vite.config.ts bindings/wasm/cli.js
